website_summaries.verdict: A versatile foot spa by a trusted brand that offers the features and functions you need to pamper your feet.
pros: Features a heat boost function that warms water quickly and keeps it at a comfortable temperature
Also includes toe touch controls, a cleansing brush, massage rollers, and pumice stone
cons: May be too small for some consumers with larger feet

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Size was too small for my husbands feet and he wears a men’s 11. It just fit mine and I wear ladies 10. The rain part barely pours any water and it doesn’t really heat up any more than the warm water recommendation it says to start with. Bubble are barely there either and when you try to use the attachments they fall off as you rub your feet on them. All in all I’m returning product cause it’s not what I’m looking for. If you just want to wash your feet it will work.
customer_reviews.author: bri12

customer_reviews.title: Hard and noisy
customer_reviews.text: The footbed is uncomfortable and really loud - so it’s hard to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: I received a used item and in these times of fungal infections being spread around, I really did not appreciate receiving an item that was obviously not washed and still showed traces of soap scum residue. The foot scrubbers and brushes were not new and also showed signs of recent use. Very unsatisfied with this purchase and returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanejap

customer_reviews.title: The BEST foot bath ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have this product and love it. I bought a second time for a friend. Water heats perfectly. It’s light weight and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Glass Girl

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time today and thought it was great. The only problem is the instructions do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today and thought it was great. The only problem is the instructions do not tell you if you can use any foot soak or the tablets that would fight any fungus or bacteria. I think it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: . I cannot believe the negative responses on this machine. I love it.Judy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I received it a week ago and I used it three times already. It is absolutely wonderful and the temperature of the water is perfect for me. My feet feel so much better and they look so much better. I would recommend this product to anyone. I cannot believe the negative responses on this machine. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with epson salts. Easy, and get eat for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Daddezio

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Water doesn't get warm, feet barely fit inside, and jets aren't strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Design Too Short
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great foot bath if they had made it longer. I only wear a size 8 shoe and my toes hit the front of the bath which makes it impossible to enjoy the waterfall.
customer_reviews.author: Janice W.

customer_reviews.title: Love warm water!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to keep the water warm with the heater. I wish it were a tad bigger though
customer_reviews.author: Pat Slaboch

customer_reviews.title: foot soaker and bubble massage
customer_reviews.text: Person with diabetic feet. USE YOUR OWN JUDGEMENT, BUT, I have found it very safe for me to use just the bobble feature with warm water. No moving parts to damage feet and I DO NOT use any of the "massage heads" on the soft skin on my feet. Suggest checking with your podiatrist, but mine said it was O.K.
customer_reviews.author: mr engineer

customer_reviews.title: Good for tired feet!
customer_reviews.text: HoMedics Shower Bliss Foot Spa, does pretty much as it is described. It heats the water to relax tired feet. It massages feet and sends a soothing shower. With the attachments, you can give yourself a reasonable pedicure and at the same time, take a few minutes to enjoy time out. The downside is that you need to use it in a place without rugs or carpeting and that means filling it, carrying and finding comfortable seating. But is does feel luxurious and when you finish, your feet feel soooo good! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: blykin

customer_reviews.title: It's great for small feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 10 and a half so my feet did not fit
customer_reviews.author: Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design!!! Blew a fuse and could have electrocuted me!
customer_reviews.text: After my 3rd time using this product, it shorted and blew a fuse in my front room. Being pregnant, it scared me and the thought that it could have electrocuted me INFURIATES me. My husband looked and water leaked from where the buttons are in the front down into the circuit board. Considering what could have happened, if I had been electrocuted (or my 3 year old daughter who loves to have her footbath)...I will never buy anything from Homedics again.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small footed  ppl
customer_reviews.text: No man with over a size 10.5 foot should use this. It does heat and has waterfall/bubble feature. ***Warning*** do not use the handle when emptying it will tip over and all your wall WILL come out.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Really good but leaks
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good foot soaker for the money. It really helped me so much. After about 15 soaks I found water underneath it. The plastic meets around the top lip and water got between the layers. So sadly, unless my husband can caulk it I need a new foot soaker. There is tremendous benefit to giving a good detox soak. I have used epsom salt and oils in mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Chucky from Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing & helped with dry feet
customer_reviews.text: So relaxing and did wonders on my dry feet. The heat works well (makes water even warmer than when you start, so it definitely won't go cold). I use it with epson salts plus a foot scrub on my feet. Afterwards use the included pumice stone (not attached to machine), and then a moisturizing foot sock mask. 2x of this routine and my feet looked amazing. My whole extended family wants one now as they are so relaxing. I'm buying a second one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Not for men over size 12
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice - the carry handle is a great innovation and it works well. But - it's too small. Men do have sore feet and my husband's size 12.5 foot touches the inside of the foot bath at heel and toe. I think the specs said up to size 13 feet - it's not comfortable for size 12.5, so it's unusable for size 13. People in Europe and the US are getting taller every decade this product is becoming more obsolete every day.
customer_reviews.author: Just Call Me Donner

customer_reviews.title: Too small for size 10 feet (men’s) and above
customer_reviews.text: This product is too small for size 10 men’s feet and above. If your feet are larger than 10”, your feet will be too large and it will be uncomfortable. Not sure why they don’t make larger foot baths to accommodate men’s size.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly less painful than stepping on Legos.
customer_reviews.text: The heat boost only does so much and that's the main reason why I bought it. It just helps keep the water from cooling down faster. Make sure you put hot water in it to begin with. The main downside is that there are plastic knobs that gouge the bottom of your feet while you're trying to rest and soak them. Slightly less painful than stepping on Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Wasson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No heat at all?! Really. $70 for cold water vibrations.
customer_reviews.author: s w

product_meta.title: HoMedics Shower Bliss Foot Spa, Shower massage water jets, Pedicure center with 3 attachments, Toe-touch control, FB-625H
product_meta.description:
Treat your feet after a long day of work with the Shower Bliss Foot Spa. This foot bath provides the ultimate foot spa with its features that include massaging water jets, heat boost power, pedicure center, comfort design, and toe-touch control. These features work together to revive and comfort your tired, overwork feet. 

HoMedics is about creating a healthy home environment that helps you relax your body, de-stress, and simplify your life. Since our beginnings in 1987, HoMedics has created, innovated, and refined a remarkable line of personal wellness products to become the recognized #1 Brand in Massage. Our products combine our advancements in the field of massage with modern technology to create a rewarding, satisfying massage solution that puts you totally in control, and totally relieved of stress and aches.
feature_bullets: MASSAGING BUBBLES: Enjoy a foot spa in the comfort of your own home with the Shower Bliss Foot Spa. The massage water jets work to revive your feet by gently massaging and soothing your tired, overworked feet.

HEAT BOOST POWER: Don’t worry about waiting for your water to reach the right temperature. The foot spa can transform cold water into warmer water in just minutes, while maintaining the warm temperature throughout your footbath.

PEDICURE CENTER: Three attachments are included with the footbath for the ultimate foot spa experience. The built-in pedicure center comes with a pumice stone, cleaning brush, and massage roller. They work to smooth and soften calloused feet.

COMFORT DESIGN: The Shower Bliss Foot Spa provides a comfortable footbath experience. The acu-node and comfort gel surface provides a cushion support and an additional massage  while you soak your feet.

TOE-TOUCH CONTROL: The foot spa was designed with a convenient toe-touch control that allows you to adjust the jets and temperature with your toes, without having to reach down to adjust them. It also has an easy-tote handle to easily carry your bath.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
